snippet.title: 60 Parsecs! Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Atomic Space Age Adventure begins 18th September 2018 on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/646270/60_Parsecs/

This is 60 Parsecs! - the space-bound sequel from the creators of 60 Seconds! 
► https://youtu.be/vL3AI6MYTD8 

A dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and brain parasites you can handle.

Time to act, Captain!
Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. When push comes to gamma-powered shove, will you have what it takes to find a new home?

60 Parsecs!
STEAM ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/646270
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://www.60parsecs.com
OFFICIAL TWITTER ► https://twitter.com/60parseconds 
OFFICIAL FACEBOOK ► http://www.facebook.com/RG60parsecs

60 Seconds!
GAME TRAILER ► https://youtu.be/vL3AI6MYTD8
STEAM ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/368360
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://www.60secondsgame.com
OFFICIAL FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/RG60seconds

Here be robots!
STUDIO WEBSITE ► http://www.robotgentleman.com
STUDIO TWITTER ► http://www.facebook.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO FACEBOOK ► http://www.twitter.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO DISCORD ► https://discord.gg/8pwVJu6

Credits:
Production: Robot Gentleman
Directed by Juliusz Zenkner
Writing: Dominik Gotojuch
Music: Inon Zur
Animation: Mateusz Lewicz
Compositing: Michał Makowski
Narrator: Duffy Weber
Associate Producer: Anastazja Kulińska
Additional Art: Agata Bednorz
Sound Design: Bartosz Maćkowiak
Additional Sound Design: https://www.freesfx.co.uk/
